attributes.action: modernise the way that patents can be filed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK Intellectual Property Office (Patent Office) does excellent work in helping to protect British innovation and ensuring rewards for individuals and companies who invest in sound research.

However, the Patent Office does not operate in the modern age. Although initial filing can be done online, a lot of time is wasted because of the insistence for documents to be filed by post.

This petition urges the Prime Minister and his government to consider whether innovation is being tackled in an innovative way, and to ensure that the Patent Office is reformed to ensure modern and efficient operation.
